name: Application
description: Represents the Excel application that manages the workbook.

properties.name: calculationMode
properties.description: Returns the calculation mode used in the workbook.

methods.name: calculate
methods.description: Recalculate all currently opened workbooks in Excel.

parameters.name: calculationType
parameters.description: Specifies the calculation type to use.

methods.name: suspendApiCalculationUntilNextSync
methods.description: Suspends calculation until the next "context.sync()" is called. Once set, it is the developer's responsibility to re-calc the workbook, to ensure that any dependencies are propagated.
